remarks: A substitution into a theorem remains true. ~ sbt with the existence of no virtual hypotheses for the hypothesis expressed as the empty virtual hypothesis collection.  (Contributed by Alan Sare, 4-Feb-2017.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
sbtT.1 $e |- ( T. -> ph ) $.
sbtT $p |- [ y / x ] ph $.
